title: Watching the Taylor Swift and Scooter Braun Documentary So You Don’t Have To: Podcast
description: Unfortunately, Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood brings nothing new to the table. Watching the Taylor Swift and Scooter Braun Documentary So You Don’t Have To: Podcast Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: The Good for a Weekend hosts review and react to the new documentary Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood. Spoiler alert: it's not great.
text: Listen via: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Amazon Music | More Platforms Good for a Weekend hosts MK and Kressie always have your back, that much you can count on. That’s why they’ve sacrificed their sanity to watch the Max documentary Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood — all so you don’t have to. Listen to their review above or wherever you get your podcasts. Get Taylor Swift Tickets Here Split into two episodes, one covering “Taylor’s version” and one covering “Scooter’s version,” the doc mini-series’ portrayal of the conflict sadly brings nothing new to the table. Overall, if MK and Kressie had to sum up Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood in one word, it’d easily be “cringe!” Listen to the two summarize and react to Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood above. If you do dare to watch Bad Blood for yourself, at least make it a value proposition by signing up for the Max/Hulu/Disney+ bundle, which can save you up to 38% compared to purchasing the services separately. Please also take the time to like, review, and subscribe to Good for a Weekend wherever you get your podcasts, and keep up to date with all our series by following the Consequence Podcast Network. You can support Good for a Weekend and join the conversation through Discord, playlists, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter here.
html:
Listen via: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Amazon Music | More Platforms

Good for a Weekend hosts MK and Kressie always have your back, that much you can count on. That’s why they’ve sacrificed their sanity to watch the Max documentary Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood — all so you don’t have to. Listen to their review above or wherever you get your podcasts.

Get Taylor Swift Tickets Here

Split into two episodes, one covering “Taylor’s version” and one covering “Scooter’s version,” the doc mini-series’ portrayal of the conflict sadly brings nothing new to the table. Overall, if MK and Kressie had to sum up Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood in one word, it’d easily be “cringe!”

Listen to the two summarize and react to Taylor Swift vs Scooter Braun: Bad Blood above. If you do dare to watch Bad Blood for yourself, at least make it a value proposition by signing up for the Max/Hulu/Disney+ bundle, which can save you up to 38% compared to purchasing the services separately.

Please also take the time to like, review, and subscribe to Good for a Weekend wherever you get your podcasts, and keep up to date with all our series by following the Consequence Podcast Network. You can support Good for a Weekend and join the conversation through Discord, playlists, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter here.
